short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleash Sonic’s speed and energy with this live wallpaper Chrome extension! 🚀💨

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring the thrill of Sonic the Hedgehog to your browser with vibrant Chrome live wallpapers. Every new tab will ignite your screen with Sonic’s lightning-fast adventures, offering a fun and engaging browsing experience. Designed for speed, security, and smooth performance, this extension ensures a seamless experience as you race through the web.

Features:
⚡ Dynamic live wallpapers featuring Sonic in action
🌐 Quick access to your favorite site shortcuts
🔍 Customizable search bar for your chosen search engine
📂 Developer info and easy removal links
Race ahead with Sonic and transform your browsing experience today! 💨
